description: Allows the user to create vibrations and quakes, making them a Tremor Human. Considered the strongest Paramecia-type Devil Fruit with the power to destroy the world.

users.circumstances: Whitebeard has possessed this fruit for decades

abilityReveals.description: User can create an earthquake so massive that it physically tilts an entire island. The quake-infused punch creates devastating shockwaves through the ground and sea.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Whitebeard uses this to defeat Vice Admiral John Giant, creating an earthquake that tilts the entire island of Marineford to one side.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Can create earthquakes and shockwaves of catastrophic scale
strengths.description: The fruit's power is sufficient to alter the physical geography of entire islands and potentially destroy the world.

description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into magma at will, making them a Magma Human. One of the most destructive Logia-type Devil Fruits.

users.circumstances: Akainu possesses this fruit as an Admiral

abilityReveals.description: User creates a great number of magma fists that are fired into the sky. After a delay, they rain down upon the battlefield like meteors, causing enormous area damage and melting ice.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Akainu uses this technique under Sengoku's orders to melt the ice battlefield and damage the Moby Dick, eliminating the pirates' path forward.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.description: Can launch volleys of magma attacks that rain down over a wide battlefield, melting ice and destroying structures.
As a Logia user, can transform into magma to avoid physical attacks.
